## Introduction
This R Markdown document demonstrates how to scrape the CSV example table from  
Wikipedia’s *Delimiter-separated values* page using the `rvest` package.

## Step 1 – Load Packages
```{r}
library(rvest)
```

## Step 2 – Read and Parse the Page
```{r}
url <- "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Delimiter-separated_values"
page <- read_html(url)
tables <- html_table(page, fill = TRUE)
head(tables[[1]])
```

## Step 3 – Save as CSV
```{r}
write.csv(tables[[1]], "csv_example_r.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```

The file **csv_example_r.csv** is now saved in your local folder.
